title: THE PATTERNMAKER. Nine science fiction stories.
description: • Introduction (The Patternmaker) • essay by Lucy Sussex • 3 • The Patternmaker • shortstory by Dave Luckett • 19 • Go Down, Moses • shortstory by Gillian Rubinstein • 29 • Home Free • shortstory by Michael Pryor • 47 • Steering the Waters • shortstory by Dirk Strasser • 61 • Jinx Ship • shortstory by Leanne Frahm • 79 • One Last Zoom at the Buzz Bar • shortstory by Alison Goodman [as by Alison M. Goodman ] • 103 • The Walk • (1992) • shortstory by Greg Egan • 121 • Falling • shortstory by Brian Caswell • 139 • The Fruit of the Tree of the Knowledge of Good and Evil • shortstory by Sam Sejavka
author: Lucy Sussex
